name: Lezyne Micro Floor Drive HPG Pump
description: Hand-pump size, floor-pump efficiency. If you need a smaller pump at home or a high-pressure pump on your bike, this one fits the bill. The flip-thread chuck quickly changes to Presta or Schrader, and the integrated bleed valve helps if you pump too much.CNC-machined aluminum barrel, shafe, base and handle.Air Bleed System allows you to remove some pressure if needed.Integrated pressure gauge on hose.Pump head is compatible with both Presta and Schrader valves.Large pressure gauge for easy reading.Frame mount included.
